Package org.regele.totask2.service

cross cutting concerns (reporting security, caching).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditingService
    query historic data on versioned domain models (e.g. projects, tasks..)
    AuditingService.EntityRevision
    revision holder.
    ProjectPlanDataService
    loading and converting Project data into suitable JSON Objects for gantt chart.
    ReportGenerator
    report generation with jasper report.
    UserCachingService
    basic User caching, avoiding endless db access.
    UserDetailsServiceImpl
    connect spring-security with home grown tt_user/user of totask2.
    WeekEntryService
    packaging and handling workEntries for weekly based operations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReportGenerator.ReportOutputFormat
    output format of report.

Package org.regele.totask2.service Description

cross cutting concerns (reporting security, caching). report generation, spring-security integration for user class
